item.title: Hospital Ship Special - Episode 1
item.description: The time for a realistic medical drama has come. Many characters are called for duty on Hospital Ship for various reasons. Foremost, they have to provide health care for those who are in need around the islands. Also, they look into their lives by reflecting upon their experiences made from those encounters as they traverse the ocean with the mission.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Lee Han Wi

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 1
item.description: Due to its poor condition, the hospital ship is not a preferred workplace by any doctors. However, Hyun, Jae Geol, and Joon Young are appointed to work at the ship. Meanwhile, Eun Jae, who has saved the only successor of Doosung Group, is becoming a more renowned doctor.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 2
item.description: Eun Jae's mom is treated at the hospital ship. However, Eun Jae is not happy about it. Her mom goes back home without saying goodbye to Eun Jae and suddenly collapses.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 3
item.description: Eun Jae operates on an urgent patient. By pulling off what seemed impossible, she gains trust from everyone on the ship. However, Eun Jae is indifferent and cold to the crew.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 4
item.description: Eun Jae insists that she performs surgery instead of making the patient wait. She impresses people once again with her skills. However, her reputation be-comes tarnished when people find out about the malpractice.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 5
item.description: The doctors and nurses on the hospital ship fight to save a right arm. Amidst a storm in the helpless ship, Jung Ho gets into an accident. In the isolated ship, Eun Jae decides to perform surgery.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon
item.tags: Television, Drama, Hospital Ship - Episode 5, MBC-Korean, MBC-Korean Television

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 6
item.description: Eun Jae lies and says that the reason why she came on the hospital ship is because she killed one of her patients. However, it turns out that one of her seniors made a mistake mid-surgery and caused the accident. Eun Jae decides to tell the patient's family the truth.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon
item.tags: Television, Drama, Hospital Ship - Episode 6, MBC-Korean, MBC-Korean Television

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 7
item.description: The shaman is adamant that she doesn't get treated by the doctors on board. However, while Hyun is doing a check-up on her, she collapses. As it turns out, she has serious liver cirrhosis.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon
item.tags: Television, Drama, MBC-Korean, Hospital Ship - Episode 7, MBC-Korean Television

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 8
item.description: Jae Geol tries to treat the shaman in his own way. When Eun Jae sees this, she becomes furious and asks the shaman to give her a chance to treat her. However, it is not easy to persuade the stubborn shaman.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon
item.tags: Television, Drama, MBC-Korean, Hospital Ship - Episode 8, MBC-Korean Television

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 9
item.description: Patients swarm into the hospital ship, and Eun Jae and Hyun are once again busy. They meet an ER patient by the name of Seol Jae Chan. It turns out that he has rectal cancer.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 10
item.description: For Jae Chan, Eun Jae proposes a type of surgery that has not been used before. Hyun is reminded of his own father when looking at Jae Chan. He becomes concerned regarding this surgery. Eun Jae and Hyun get into a conflict.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 11
item.description: The cancer patient keeps refusing surgery. However, Doctor Kim thinks otherwise. To Eun Jae, he offers a deal she can't refuse.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 12
item.description: Hyun's dad doesn't recognize his own son. With his father's condition getting worse, Hyun becomes frustrated. The cancer patient refuses to be operated on and says that he wants to go on a picnic with the kids for one last time.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 13
item.description: The doctors on the hospital ship go through hardships together and bond. They embrace each other's pain and become closer. In Eun Jae's heart, Hyun takes place.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 14
item.description: Hyun's father comes to his senses and signs the DNR form. The same day, it is Hyun's birthday, and Eun Jae spends time with him. Meanwhile, the hospital ship welcomes a new guest.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 15
item.description: Hyun patiently waits for Eun Jae to open up to him, but Eun Jae is still confused by her feelings. Also, the presence of Hyun's ex-girlfriend becomes a variable in their game of love. Meanwhile, a patient with Vibrio vulnificus infection comes aboard.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 16
item.description: Eun Jae is a skilled doctor, but she is a novice when it comes to love. Although the presence of Hyun's ex-girlfriend bothers her, she doesn't know what to do about it. Later on, Hyun learns that he's got competition.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 17
item.description: Park Soo Bong, who is like a father figure to Jae Geol, is found collapsed on the floor. Although it's a simple surgery, Soo Bong is not able to go under anesthesia. Eun Jae wants to proceed with the surgery, but Hyun is hesitant.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 18
item.description: Jae Geol suggests they use acupuncture on Soo Bong. The three doctors suc-cessfully perform the surgery. Meanwhile, in order to pay back the debt her fa-ther left, Eun Jae works day and night.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 19
item.description: An accident at a demolition site injures many. Eun Jae hears that her brother, Woo Jae, was also there and rushes over. The memory of when she lost her mother haunts her once again.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon
